login.message.confirm: Before verifying through the platform dnevnik.ru, you must agree that the bot will have the following account details: 1. Login 2. Full name 3. Class number and letter 4. Photo 5. Date of birth The password data is NOT saved. To agree, run the command /confirm
login.message.warn.busy: This username has already been used for verification.
unlink.message.warn: You don't have a linked account.
unlink.message.success: The account has been successfully unlinked.
order.message.warn: Before making an order, verify via dnevnik.ru.
order.message.cart.add: The product "%{}%" has been successfully added to the cart.
cart.message.warn: Before entering the shopping cart, verify through dnevnik.ru.
